## ContextTags.GLOBAL\_INTERCEPTOR\_GROUP variable

Binding tag for group name of global interceptors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
GLOBAL_INTERCEPTOR_GROUP = "globalInterceptorGroup"
```
